exceptions.tactic: intros f g h x Hf Hg Hh.

ctx: intros f' g h x Hf Hg Hh.
tactic: apply ex_filterdiff_comp_2 with (lf := fun y => y) (lg := fun y => y).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable lf (possible names are: f0, g0 and h0).

original: intros f g h x Hf Hg Hh. apply ex_filterdiff_comp_2 with (lf := fun y => y) (lg := fun y => y). - apply filterlim_pair. + apply filterdiff_continuous. exists (fun y => y). apply Hf. + apply filterdiff_continuous. exists (fun y => y). apply Hg. - apply filterlim_comp_2 with (h := h). + apply filterdiff_continuous. exists (fun y => y). apply Hf. + apply filterdiff_continuous. exists (fun y => y). apply Hg. + apply Hh.
